about_the_game:
The GO Beyond! DLC adds more content and features to Super Multitasking GO! for even more brain-tickling, thrills, and fun!

Here is what you get with this DLC:

  • You can customize Quickplay Mode's difficulty by setting the Minigame and Multitasking difficulties independently. This expands the number of unique difficulty settings from 4 to 16, giving you access to 24 more Leaderboards (12 gamepad, 12 keyboard)!

  • 15 more Missions will be added to Mission Mode, for a total of 30. You'll also unlock Mission Speedrun Mode, which challenges you to choose a difficulty, then finish all 30 Missions in one go. This has its own Leaderboards, as well! (All 30 Missions are unique to this game and do not appear in Super Duper Multitasking.)

  • You get 3 Bonus Modes, variants of Quickplay Mode with a unique twist. These have their own Leaderboards, so there are even more ways to test your skills and compete against the world! (All 3 Bonus Modes are unique to this game and do not appear in Super Duper Multitasking.)

  • The knowledge that you're supporting a one-man indie creator and his family! THANK YOU for your support!

This has its own Leaderboards, as well! (All 30 Missions are unique to this game and do not appear in Super Duper Multitasking.)

  • You get 3 Bonus Modes, variants of Quickplay Mode with a unique twist. These have their own Leaderboards, so there are even more ways to test your skills and compete against the world! (All 3 Bonus Modes are unique to this game and do not appear in Super Duper Multitasking.)

name: Super Multitasking GO! - GO Beyond Pack
short_description: The GO Beyond! DLC adds exciting new features and content to Super Multitasking GO!, including customizable difficulty for Quickplay Mode, new Missions and speedrunning support for Mission Mode, plus 3 Bonus Modes!
